title: **-- SUN DRENCHED STUDIO -- LUXURY BUILDING -- LAUNDRY ON SITE -- PETS
posting_body: ['**-- SUN DRENCHED STUDIO -- LUXURY BUILDING -- LAUNDRY ON SITE -- PETS OK--**', 'Listing ID #: 212820', 'Price: $3,000', 'Property Type: Condo', 'Bedrooms: Studio', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'SUN DRENCHED STUDIO LOCATED ON WALL STREET!', 'BEAUTIFUL LUXURY BUILDING WITH ELITE AMENITIES!', '**Broker fee applies', 'Building amenities include: Resident-only Speakeasy & Lounge Cardio Room with Peloton® bikes Weight Room Dance/Yoga Studio Sky Lounge and Roof Terrace with BBQs Social Lounge Game Room Golf Simulator Children’s Playroom Library Business Center 24-hour Doorman & Concierge Services', 'In-Unit Washer/Dryer Valet Services including Housekeeping', 'Located in the heart of the Financial District, this building is within walking distance to the South Street Seaport, Brookfield Place, and all major subway lines (1,2,3,A,C,E,Path train)', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
